summary: Nordhero Quiver for all arrow types..........
descriptionHtml:
Simple Nordhero Universal Quiver replacer

Description;

wanted one quiver for all arrows types that would \"fit\" asthetically with different armors, Wasn\'t pleased with the different vanilla quivers so I found a mod that does smething similar but has i recipes to it and something about private arrows. didn\'t want that stuff but only to replace the 
quiver the player carries (we assume player just restocks the quiver with found arrows..no need for recipes in my opinion). So because i cannot mod very well, i just edited the file pathway from that mod and didn\'t use the given esp thus making this mod a simple universal quiver retexture/replacer.

this mod replaces the following quivers for the nordhero quiver (in my opinion it looks realistic, neat, and compact);

daedric quiver
draugr quiver
dwarven quiver
ebony quiver
elven quiver
glass quiver
iron quiver
nordhero quiver
orcish quiver
steel quiver

Installation (Manual): 
- Download the main file 
- Open the main archive and move the textures, meshes, to Skyrim data directory. (These are all the files required)(just follow the file path)
  c;\\program files\\the elder scrolls v skyrim\\data

Uninstallation (Manual):
- Remove the textures, meshes

I did not make any of these meshes or retextures; what i did was edit their file path locations so that they only replace the files i want. subsequently this will also change any npc that equips arrow/quivers to the nordhero which i don\'t mind

All credit for the original mod goes to; 

the original mod \"Private Selective Quivers\" by Ryeong and uploaded by hl84 on nexus
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6546

Have not had any bugs/issues but if there are comment, i am new to modding so dont expect miracle fixes.

Comment, endorse its all good, All THANKS GOES TO hl84/Ryeong     

You may use this mod so long as you mention it origins and creators. 

My other lore friendly mods;

Thieves Guild Regular Armor Retextures 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6407

Simpler Jewel Craft pack and ideal changes 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6188

Simpler Dragonbone Weapons Pack 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6027

Recommendations;

Better steel arrows and quiver by Reisz (looks better) 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5821
author: davnat and hl84-Ryeong
